channel.title: How do i move Npcs and the Ancients Alter?
channel.description: I use Figments scape source i don't want my players to have to do Desert Treasure so i want to move the altar from the pyramid to edge. Also i don't like how th shops are so i'd like to move the to edge too. Does anyone on atm know how?

item.title: How do i move Npcs and the Ancients Alter?
item.dc:creator: @Vesnal1 Vesnal1
item.description:
@Vesnal1 wrote:

[quote=“Patrickftw, post:3, topic:217052”][quote author=johnj98 link=topic=285308.msg2311783#msg2311783 date=1215078179]
i know how to move the shops but not the alter go to shops.CFG and change the coordanates
[/quote]
It’s autospawn.cfg for the shops.

Look for public void newobject in your client.java and change the coords.[/quote]
Or he could just add a global object

In client.java search for makeGlobalObject
You should see a big line, here is an example of one

makeGlobalObject(2520, 4645, 2478, 0, 10); //rc

At the bottom of these, add this

makeGlobalObjct(xxxx, yyyy, 6552, -3, 10); //alter

XXXX is the x coordinate, YYYY is the Y coordinate.

yeah, and like Patrickftw said go to autospawn.cfg and search for the id. You will see something like this:

spawn = NPCID	XXXX	YYYY	0	0	0	0	0	1	description

NPCID is the id, xxxx is the x cords, yyyy is the y cords. to move them, just change the coordinates.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i move Npcs and the Ancients Alter?
